name: Create new HubSpot CRM contacts from Airtable records when triggered by a Webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically use the id output from the webhook to retrieve a record from Airtable and validate the email of that record with ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will add a contact to HubSpot CRM. The webhook should have a field "id" otherwise the scenario will not be triggered.
